players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so suddenly. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Charlie: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Diana. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure that the mafia doesn't continue their nefarious activities."
